block.p: KEVY-Jack. Of Fort Lee, NJ. On September 19. Beloved husband of the late Ruth. Devoted father of Audrey Wilner and Larry Kevy. Cherished father-in-law of Alfred Wilner and the late Marlene Kevy. Loving grandfather of Matthew Kevy, Stewart Wilner and Michael and Jane Wilner, and great grandfather of Maddie and Katy Wilner. Services ''Wien & Wien'' corner Park and Passaic Sts, Hackensack, NJ, Thursday, September 21 at 10AM. Should friends desire, contrbutions to Temple Sinai, Tenafly, Temple Beth Shalom of Hastingson-Hudson, NY, or Phelps Memorial Hospital, Sleepy Hollow, NY.
